summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WatchWhistle TV show tracking app. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend landing page displays correctly with proper theater theme and red accents. Authentication flow requires Emergent Google OAuth which cannot be fully tested in automated environment, but all non-authenticated features work perfectly.

integration_issues.issue: Cannot fully test Emergent Google OAuth flow in automated environment - requires real OAuth callback
integration_issues.note: This is expected behavior - OAuth requires external authentication service

passed_tests: All 15 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Landing page loads with correct theater theme and red accents
All UI elements present with proper data-testid attributes
Responsive design works on desktop, tablet, and mobile
Feature cards display correctly with red accent icons
Button hover effects and interactions work
Typography and fonts load correctly (Inter, Space Grotesk)
Theater screen element with proper styling
No broken images or console errors

success_percentage.frontend_authenticated: Cannot test without real OAuth - requires manual testing
